attributes.action: Re-establish the democracy in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government does not listen to the people of this country. 
We want to be able to vote on important issues.
Most people do not trust any MP to act reasonable, therefore we want more rights as voters and the right to vote on europe.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
